overview:
Christen Krogh is Chief Development Officer at Opera Software.

He holds a doctorate in philosophy from Oslo University, and a B.Sc.Hons in Computer from Glasgow University. Krogh’s prior positions include President of Engineering at Opera Software, Business Developer at TV 2 Interaktiv, Research Director at SINTEF, and Research Fellow at Oslo University.

Prior to Opera, Krogh worked as research director at SINTEF Telecom and Informatics, and as business developer at TV2 Interactive. his previous work experience includes assignments as research scientist at various research institutes, as well as the position as adviser and group leader.
